entry.title: android marquee data pass
entry.summary:
I built a marquee in android with dynamic texts. What i want is onclick on a text it will lead me to new activity with that text moving in bundle too towards new activity. I am able to built marquee and start new activity but still in new activity all marquee text is displaying.

 t = (TextView) view.findViewById(R.id.mywidget);
            t.setSelected(true);
            t.setOnClickListener(new View.OnClickListener() {
            @Override
            public void onClick(View v) {

            // in.putExtra("EdiTtEXTvALUE", t.getText().toString());
            Intent in = new Intent(mContext, News.class);
            in.putExtra("EdiTtEXTvALUE", t.getText().toString());
            mContext.startActivity(in);


            }
            });

this is marquee built

 for (int i = 0; i < offerlist.length(); i++) {

            url.add(offerlist.getJSONObject(i).getString("url"));
            t.setText( offerlist.getJSONObject(i).getString("name"));

            }

            t.setSelected(true);

i am trying to create bundle but its giving error.

entry.title: What are the best open source alternatives to AirDroid application?
entry.summary: Is there any project that's similar to AirDroid transfer app which is still being supported?
